dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare wander into the domain of shadows, fool. What pitiful excuse for a creature are you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am Morvath, the Dark Sorcerer, and I am here to claim what is rightfully mine.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Morvath, the misguided seeker of darkness. Your arrogance blinds you to the imminent doom that awaits you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your threats hold no power over me, phantom. Stand aside or face the consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Consequences, you say? Let me show you the true meaning of despair!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not cower before the likes of you. Prepare for a battle you will never forget!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A battle it shall be. Your end draws near, Morvath. Darkness claims you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your malevolent presence, but I choose to ignore it. Leave this place, phantom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You choose ignorance? So be it. Your fate is sealed, but I shall trouble you no longer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek the Heart of Light, and nothing will stand in my way. Step aside, or face the consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The Heart of Light... an ambition as futile as your existence. Prepare for the abyss to embrace you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I embrace the shadows and welcome the abyss. Your threats mean nothing to one as powerful as I.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Powerful? Your delusions of grandeur will be your downfall, sorcerer. Darkness consumes all.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I choose to leave you be, phantom. My path lies beyond your wretched presence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you wish, insignificant one. Your retreat saves you from a fate darker than death.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no time for your empty threats, phantom. I will claim what is mine, with or without your interference.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a creature so feeble. The shadows shall be your eternal shroud.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Feeble I may be, but my power surpasses your understanding. Prepare yourself for the inevitable.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Underestimate me at your own peril, sorcerer. The darkness relishes in the downfall of the prideful.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your darkness holds no sway over me. I choose to walk my path unhindered by your presence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Walk on, ignorant one. The shadows will watch your every step until they claim you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am but a traveler passing through this realm. I mean you no harm, phantom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A traveler, you say? Your presence taints the very essence of this place. Leave before I decide your fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek no quarrel with you, phantom. Let us part ways peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful resolutions hold no value here. Your departure or demise, choose swiftly.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall depart from this accursed place. May our paths never cross again.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Depart and never return, insignificant one. Your absence is all that is desired.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to be threatened by the likes of you. I will stay and face whatever consequences may come.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Refusal is futile. Embrace the darkness that looms over you, foolish traveler.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer peace, phantom. Let us coexist in this realm without conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace... a concept foreign to one such as I. Your offer is as meaningless as your presence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see that negotiation is not an option with you. Farewell, phantom. I shall trouble you no longer.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell, insignificant traveler. May the shadows never cross our paths again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your hostility is clear. I will leave this place, but mark my words, I shall return if provoked.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Provocation will lead to your undoing, traveler. Remember the darkness that awaits your return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense the darkness within you, phantom. Let us share our knowledge and coexist in this twisted realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge shared with one as naive as you would be wasted. Depart, before darkness claims you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Naive or not, I seek understanding. Your offer is rejected, but I will heed your warning and leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding eludes you, traveler. Leave and never seek knowledge from the shadows again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your rejection is noted, phantom. I will depart, but remember our encounter. Knowledge may be found elsewhere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Remembrance serves no purpose in the shadows. Forget this place, and forget the darkness that dwells within.
